## ResolverFunction interface

A function to provide resolution of injected values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ResolverFunction 
```

## Example


```ts
const resolver: ResolverFunction = (ctx, injection, session) {
  return session.currentBinding?.key;
}
```
